raw: UPDATE 2-Egypt's cuts interest rates by 300 basis points in face of coronavirus .

raw: By Nadine Awadalla

raw: CAIRO , March 16 ( Reuters ) - Egypt ’s central bank slashed its main interest rates by 300 basis points at an unscheduled meeting on Monday , saying it was making a “ preemptive ” move to support the economy in the face of the COVID-19 outbreak .
replaced: CAIRO , March 16 ( Reuters ) - Egypt ’s central bank  Egypt ’s central bank The cut  CAIRO , March 16 ( Reuters ) - Egypt ’s central bank main interest rates by 300 basis points at an unscheduled meeting on Monday , saying CAIRO , March 16 ( Reuters ) - Egypt ’s central bank was making a “ preemptive ” move to support the economy in the face of the COVID-19 outbreak .

raw: The bank ’s monetary policy committee cut the overnight lending rate to 10.25 % from 13.25 % and the overnight deposit rate to 9.25 % from 12.25 % .
replaced: The bank ’s monetary policy committee cut the overnight lending rate to 10.25 % from 13.25 % and the overnight deposit rate to 9.25 % from 12.25 % .

raw: Those are the lowest rates since early 2016 , before Egypt embarked on a three - year IMF - backed economic reform programme .
replaced: Those are the lowest rates since early 2016 , before Egypt embarked on a three - year IMF - backed economic reform programme .

raw: “ The MPC ’s preemptive decision provides appropriate support to domestic economic activity given the current challenging external environment , while the inflation outlook remains consistent with achieving the inflation target of 9 percent ( ±3 percentage points ) in 2020 Q4 , ” a statement from the central bank said .
replaced: “ The MPC ’s preemptive decision provides appropriate support to domestic economic activity given the current challenging external environment , while the inflation outlook remains consistent with achieving the inflation target of 9 percent ( ±3 percentage points ) in 2020 Q4 , ” a statement from the central bank said .

raw: “ The MPC will continue to closely monitor all economic developments and will not hesitate to adjust its stance to achieve its price stability mandate over the medium term . ”
replaced: “ MPC will continue to closely monitor all economic developments and will not hesitate to adjust MPC stance to achieve MPC price stability mandate over the medium term . ”

raw: The central bank ’s monetary policy committee had not been due to meet until April 2 to set interest rates .

raw: It had held rates steady at its past two meetings after cutting them by 350 basis points between August and November last year .

raw: Egypt has confirmed 150 cases of coronavirus , and three deaths .

raw: “ The hit from the coronavirus outbreak is likely to mount in the coming weeks and months and , with inflation no longer a major concern for the CBE , more stimulus probably lies in store , ” said Jason Tuvey , senior emerging markets economist at Capital Economics .
